landing.heroSubtitle: Develop expertise in documentary credits, guarantees, foreign exchange and international commerce operations. Specialized training for Santander Trade professionals.
landing.feature1Desc: Training developed by experts in documentary credits, bank guarantees and international commerce operations.
landing.feature2Desc: Certificates and badges recognizing competencies in Trade operations, LC, ACC and foreign exchange operations.
landing.feature3Desc: Real case studies, operation simulations and practical challenges based on market scenarios.
landing.journeyStep1Desc: Access the platform and choose your Trade training plan.
landing.journeyStep2Desc: Specialized modules in LC, ACC, foreign exchange and bank guarantees.
landing.journeyStep3Desc: Operation simulations and real market case studies.
landing.journeyStep4Desc: Get your Trade and International Commerce specialization certificate.
landing.ctaTitle: Transform your team with specialized training
landing.ctaSubtitle: More qualified professionals in Trade operations, credits and foreign exchange.
landing.faq1Q: How do I access the training plans?
landing.faq1A: After authentication, you will have access to all available plans. Register for the modules of your interest.
landing.faq2A: Yes, all certificates are recognized by Santander and included in your professional development records.
landing.faq3Q: Can I do the plans at my own pace?
landing.faq3A: Yes, the platform allows flexible learning. You control your study schedule.
landing.trainingPlansSubtitle: Choose the plan suited to your professional profile
landing.trustedBy: Santander training platform for Trade and International Commerce

landing.heroSubtitle: Operational excellence training for Trade Finance teams.
landing.heroSubtitle2: Standardized processes. Centralized knowledge. Consistent results.

intro.title: What is the Training Portal?
intro.p1: The Trade Datahub Training Portal is the official operational training platform for teams working in foreign trade processes. Developed within Santander Digital Services' Shared Services context, the portal centralizes all knowledge necessary for correct, standardized, and efficient execution of Trade Finance operations.
intro.p2: Through structured training paths by operational area, employees develop technical competencies aligned with official processes, international regulations, and industry best practices.

processes.title: Trade Operational Areas
processes.subtitle: Specialized training for each stage of the Trade Finance process

remittances.title: International Remittances
remittances.description: Execution of financial flows associated with foreign trade operations, ensuring correct fund movement between originator and beneficiary.
remittances.focus: Correct execution, error reduction, and global standardization

collections.title: International Collections (Eurocobros)
collections.description: International collection operations where the bank acts as intermediary between exporter and importer, ensuring documentary and financial flow.
items: Receipt and verification of commercial documents
collections.focus: Deadline control and collection cycle monitoring

lcs.title: Letters of Credit (Trade Finance – LCs)
lcs.description: Operations where the bank acts as payment guarantor, upon compliance with documentary conditions established by UCP 600.
items: Letter of credit issuance and advising
Documentary verification per UCP 600 and ISBP
lcs.focus: Documentary rigor and adherence to international rules

financing.title: Trade Finance Financing
financing.description: Operational management of credit products linked to import and export operations, ensuring correct control and settlement.

integration.title: Integration with Trade Datahub
integration.description: The Training Portal is fully integrated with Trade Datahub, ensuring all training content faithfully reflects official processes, operational flows, and global organization standards.
items: Content aligned with documented official processes

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple and direct access to operational knowledge

steps.title: Select the Trade Area
steps.description: Choose your operational area: Remittances, Eurocobros, Letters of Credit, or Financing. Each area has specific training paths.

steps.title: Access Training Modules
steps.description: Explore modules structured by process, from fundamental concepts to advanced procedures. Content developed by operational specialists.

steps.title: Apply Daily
steps.description: Use acquired knowledge in your daily activities. Consult materials whenever needed as reference.

steps.title: Stay Updated
steps.description: Follow content updates reflecting process evolutions and Trade Finance sector regulations.

benefits.title: Benefits for Operational Teams
benefits.subtitle: Training focused on concrete operational results

clarity.title: Process Clarity
clarity.description: Complete understanding of each operational stage, eliminating doubts and ambiguities in execution.

standardization.title: Standardization
standardization.description: Uniformity in operations execution, ensuring consistency across teams and shifts.

errors.title: Error Reduction
errors.description: Significant decrease in operational failures through precise procedural knowledge.

autonomy.title: Greater Autonomy
autonomy.description: Employees better prepared to make decisions and resolve daily situations.

onboarding.title: Efficient Onboarding
onboarding.description: Faster integration of new team members with immediate access to structured knowledge.

certification.title: Certification
certification.description: Formal recognition of acquired competencies through completion certificates.

cta.title: Access the Training Portal
cta.subtitle: Explore training paths by Trade process and develop essential competencies for operational excellence.
